Forgotten Voices of the Blitz and the Battle of Britain uses material from Imperial War Museumâ€™s sound archive.  It was written by Joshua Levine to bring together interviews with people who lived through the Blitz and the Battle of Britain.  It features interviews with soldiers, airmen, fire-fighters, air-raid wardens and civilians, people in the air and on the ground.
